template&lt; class Iter &gt; 
move_iterator&lt;Iter&gt; operator+
    ( typename move_iterator&lt;Iter&gt;::difference_type n,
      const move_iterator&lt;Iter&gt;&amp; it );
}}
{{dcl|since=c++20|
template&lt; class Iter &gt; 
constexpr move_iterator&lt;Iter&gt; operator+
    ( std::iter_difference_t&lt;Iter&gt; n, const move_iterator&lt;Iter&gt;&amp; it );
}}
{{dcl end}}

Returns the iterator {{c|it}} incremented by {{c|n}}.

{{rrev|since=c++20|
{{cpp/enable if|{{c|it.base() + n}} is well-formed and has type {{tt|Iter}}}}.
}}

===Parameters===
{{par begin}}
{{par|n|the number of positions to increment the iterator}}
{{par|it|the iterator adaptor to increment}}
{{par end}}

===Return value===
